metadata.title: CVE-2018-5147 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The libtremor library has the same flaw as CVE-2018-5146. This library isused by Firefox in place of libvorbis on Android and ARM platforms. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 52.7.2 and Firefox < 59.0.1.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5147` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

libvorbisidec1 - 1.0.2+svn18153-0.2+deb7u1build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
libvorbisidec package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.2+svn18153-0.2+deb7u1build0.16.04.1').
